signals:craftinginfo-signals-text:
Signals
Glowing wires.

To start working with signals, buy a Signal source and some Signal wire to a merchant.
signals:block-handbooktext-tetrode: If no signal is applied on the screen lead, this component behaves like a triode. When signal is applied on the screen, it accentuates the cathode to anode attenuation with grid signal.
signals:block-handbooktext-source: A mysterious artefact. Emits a signal of magnitude 15.
signals:block-handbooktext-actuator: When powered with a signal, activates the block in front of it.
signals:block-handbooktext-anemometer: Outputs a signal proportional to the wind speed.
signals:block-handbooktext-buzzer: When powered with a signal, emits a continous sound. The pitch can be adjusted using right-click.
signals:block-handbooktext-lightbulb: When powered with a signal, emits light.
signals:block-handbooktext-lightsensor: Signal attenuation between the two leads is reduced in presence of light.
signals:block-handbooktext-meter: When powered with a signal, the needle is deflected according to the signal level.
signals:block-handbooktext-pressureplate: Transmits signal with no attenuation when weight is applied on the plate.
signals:block-handbooktext-resistor: Attenuates signal according to the resistor value.
signals:block-handbooktext-triode: This block has three connections: an anode, a cathode and a grid. signal is transmitted only from cathode to anode with an attenuation given by the signal value on the grid.
signals:block-handbooktext-delay: The delay outputs a signal of the same level than the signal applied at its input, with a delay. The delay is configured by changing the cursor position.
signals:block-handbooktext-switch: When on, conducts signal without attenuation. When off, blocks signal. On/off state is changed when activated by a player or an actuator.
signals:item-handbooktext-wire: Right click on each connector with a wire to create a connection. To remove the connection, you can right-click on both connectors holding a shear.
